content.text: Welcome! In this lesson, you'll learn how to order 'haring', a famous Dutch snack, from a fish stand ('haringkraam'). Let's get started!

data.phrase: Ik wil graag een broodje haring.
data.meaning: I would like a herring sandwich.

content.title: Phase 1: The Initial Order
content.setting: You are at a bustling fish stand ('haringkraam') and want to order for the first time.

conversation_flow.title: Place your order
conversation_flow.translation: Good day! How can I help you?

conversation_flow.title: Add onions
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Een broodje haring. Wilt u er uitjes bij?
conversation_flow.translation: A herring sandwich. Would you like onions with that?

conversation_flow.title: Receive confirmation
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Komt voor elkaar. Een broodje haring met uitjes.
conversation_flow.translation: Coming right up. A herring sandwich with onions.

data.phrase: Kunt u het in stukjes snijden?
data.meaning: Can you cut it into pieces?

content.title: Phase 2: Customization
content.setting: The vendor asks if you want another common topping.

conversation_flow.title: Reply about pickles
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Wilt u er ook zuur bij?
conversation_flow.translation: Would you like pickles with that too?

conversation_flow.title: Make a special request
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oké, geen zuur. Anders nog iets?

conversation_flow.title: Receive confirmation
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Natuurlijk, geen probleem. Ik snijd hem voor u.
conversation_flow.translation: Of course, no problem. I'll cut it for you.

content.title: Phase 3: The Payment Problem
content.setting: Your herring is ready. Now it's time to pay.

conversation_flow.title: Ask for the price
conversation_flow.translation: Here you go, your herring sandwich.

conversation_flow.title: Hear the bad news
conversation_flow.translation: Oh, sorry. Not today (no card payments today).

data.phrase: Ik heb alleen een briefje van 50.
data.meaning: I only have a 50 euro note.

content.title: Phase 4: Negotiation & Solution
content.setting: The card machine is broken. You need to find another way to pay.

conversation_flow.title: Get a positive response
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Even kijken... Ja, dat moet lukken.
conversation_flow.translation: Let's see... Yes, that should work.

content.title: Phase 5: Transaction Completion
content.setting: You've found a solution. Time to complete the purchase.

conversation_flow.title: Say thank you
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Dank u wel. Hier is 46 euro terug en uw broodje. Eet smakelijk!
conversation_flow.translation: Thank you. Here is 46 euros back and your sandwich. Enjoy your meal!
